name: Level Maker
description:
A small experiment - Testing out creating a level editor with autotiling, saving, loading, and a test suite all in one. 

Editor Controls:
Left click - place tiles / select in GUI
Right click - erase tiles
Middle click and drag - move the map

Tester Controls:
A/D - move player
Spacebar - Hold to start charging the jump, let go to jump
Releasing spacebar while holding A/D keys will jump to that direction
